firstSection_text_1: Enter Your Device's 15-Digit IMEI Or Serial Number
firstSection_text_2: All Devices supported, including Apple, iPhone, Huawei and Samsung.
firstSection_text_3: Dial *#06# to get your phone's IMEI number
header_imei_body: imeicheck.com offers a variety of IMEI Check Services providing all the information about your device, fast and accessible!
offer_body: Dynamic yet stable backend, with a simple front end process. Each user has their own thread so they can process up to 600 orders per minute. This ensures even with increased volume orders will never be delayed.
secondSection_text_2: Select Your Brand To Find Your Device's IMEI Number
service_body: Find my iPhone, iCloud Status, Warranty Check, Simlock Check, Carrier Check, Samsung IMEI Check, Huawei Check, Blacklist Check, Purchase Country and Much More!
service_body_1: We offer two different APIs for DHRU Fusion and for PHP JSON, allowing businesses to easily integrate our services into any system!
service_body_2: All our IMEI Check Services are delivered instantly, so you get the information you NEED all about your devices in only a FEW SECONDS.
service_body_3: There is no risk using our service as it does not require access to your device or you to download software!
service_body_4: Our database is up and running 24/7 for you to ensure we are always here for your needs!
service_header: We are a Genuine Source for IMEI Check Services!
